title: internal_reconcile_report_orphan Lambda Output
description: The output for the internal_reconcile_report_orphan Lambda.

jobId.description: The unique ID of the reconciliation job.

anotherPage.description: Indicates if more results can be retrieved on another page.

keyPath.description: key path and filename of the object.

lastUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, of last update of the object.

sizeInBytes.description: Size in bytes of the object.

storageClass.description: AWS storage class the object is in.
